variable.comment: 1 is easy, 2 is med, 4 is hard
variable.name: DC_OfficialDifficulty

variable.comment: Says What the player has recently clicked on. Blank if its nothing.
variable.name: DC_CurrentlySelected

sub-events.comment: makes sure only one thing is selected
updated to 70% speed as per roberto commando
updated to 70% speed as per roberto commando

variable.comment: used as a counter variable to hold which parking space they should pick

variable.comment: holds the interior temp values of parkingspaces

variable.comment: holds the number for reference of parking spaces that are empty

variable.comment: since tempparking is a temp variable, holds the full number of characters from the front

event-group.description: n is empty, y is Full, B is blocked (blue car)

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Timer: " & DC_TempTimer & " Emissions: " & DC_Emissions & " stuff parked: " & DC_StuffParked

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Timer: " & DC_TempTimer & " Emissions: " & DC_Emissions & " stuff parked: " & DC_StuffParked

events.comment: on difficulty 1 (tutorial) timer will not advance

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Now try to park as many vehicles as you can in the other difficulties!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "You parked " & DC_StuffParked & " vehicles. Park " & 10-DC_StuffParked & " more to earn 3 stars!"

event-group.title: Hacky way to put parking spaces back
